1.0.name: wordpress/fotogram
1.0.description: Fotogram is a clean and fast loading theme with custom background, custom header, Twitter, Facebook and Youtube links - easy to customise to your needs. Widget and custom menu friendly - install and you're ready to go. Ideal for photographers, designers and anyone who wishes to show off their work.
